name: Update README on Feature
description: Automatically update README when new features are added

action.message:
A task was just completed. Please:

1. Review what was implemented
2. Check if README.md needs updates:
   - New features to document
   - New API endpoints
   - New configuration options
   - New dependencies
   - Updated installation steps

3. If updates are needed:
   - Update the relevant sections
   - Keep the existing style
   - Add examples if applicable
   - Update table of contents if present

4. Show me the proposed changes before applying
